Original: Did that request pique your interest?
It sounds somewhat nerve-wracking...
It comes from the Outland Count.
[Page]
"The demonic voice"... Well, explorers
like you should have less to fear from
this kind of thing.
[Page]
To hear more of the details, go to the
Grand Court. But be careful... I shall
await your swift return.
Translation: Did that request pique your interest?
It sounds somewhat nerve-wracking...
It comes from the Outland Count.
[Page]
"The demonic voice"... Well, explorers
like you should have less to fear from
this kind of thing.
[Page]
To hear more of the details, go to the
Grand Court. But be careful... I shall
await your swift return.

Original: Good work... It seems the demonic
voice was nothing more than the wind
blowing through a chasm?
[Page]
I suspected as much. This sort of
request is quite common. Explorers can
be strange...
[Page]
They think nothing of fighting beastly
monsters to the death, but if a ghost
is involved, they cower in fear.
[Page]
What about your guild? Are you
particularly superstitious?
Translation: Good work... It seems the demonic
voice was nothing more than the wind
blowing through a chasm?
[Page]
I suspected as much. This sort of
request is quite common. Explorers can
be strange...
[Page]
They think nothing of fighting beastly
monsters to the death, but if a ghost
is involved, they cower in fear.
[Page]
What about your guild? Are you
particularly superstitious?

Original: Ah, so you were the ones to take up
the request. The other explorers are
so scared that none would touch it.
[Page]
Tell me, my friends, have you heard
about the [Color:5]demonic voice[Color:0] at the [Color:5]Sacred
Mountains[Color:0]? Many explorers claim to.
[Page]
It is probably merely a beast's howl.
You cannot be ruled by fear! Explorers
must be courageous and inquisitive!
[Page]
That is why I want you to seek out
points where the voice can be heard
and identify where it comes from.
[Page]
Reports say the voice is often heard
in the [Color:5]northeast[Color:0] of the Sacred
Mountains. Be careful, my friends!
Translation: Ah, so you were the ones to take up
the request. The other explorers are
so scared that none would touch it.
[Page]
Tell me, my friends, have you heard
about the [Color:5]demonic voice[Color:0] at the [Color:5]Sacred
Mountains[Color:0]? Many explorers claim to.
[Page]
It is probably merely a beast's howl.
You cannot be ruled by fear! Explorers
must be courageous and inquisitive!
[Page]
That is why I want you to seek out
points where the voice can be heard
and identify where it comes from.
[Page]
Reports say the voice is often heard
in the [Color:5]northeast[Color:0] of the Sacred
Mountains. Be careful, my friends!

Original: Ah, hello, my friends! Did you find
out the true identity of the demonic
voice?
Translation: Ah, hello, my friends! Did you find
out the true identity of the demonic
voice?

Original: [Color:5]Did you find its identity?[Color:0]
Yes
No
I need more information
Translation: [Color:5]Did you find its identity?[Color:0]
Yes
No
I need more information

Original: Ah, not yet, I see... No, there's no
need to worry. I can be a patient man.
[Page]
Though... I do not like to be one.
Oh yes, I told you this earlier...
I wasn't trying to remind you.
Translation: Ah, not yet, I see... No, there's no
need to worry. I can be a patient man.
[Page]
Though... I do not like to be one.
Oh yes, I told you this earlier...
I wasn't trying to remind you.

Original: I want you to find the [Color:5]places where
the voice can be heard[Color:0] as well as the
[Color:5]origin of the voice[Color:0].
[Page]
Many explorers who have visited the
[Color:5]northeast[Color:0] of the [Color:5]Sacred Mountains[Color:0] have
heard it. The rest is up to you.
[Page]
Wherever the sound can be heard,
I assume the origin is not far off.
[Page]
Though hearing it from the sky makes
it trickier... You need to consider
not just directions, but [Color:5]altitudes[Color:0].
Translation: I want you to find the [Color:5]places where
the voice can be heard[Color:0] as well as the
[Color:5]origin of the voice[Color:0].
[Page]
Many explorers who have visited the
[Color:5]northeast[Color:0] of the [Color:5]Sacred Mountains[Color:0] have
heard it. The rest is up to you.
[Page]
Wherever the sound can be heard,
I assume the origin is not far off.
[Page]
Though hearing it from the sky makes
it trickier... You need to consider
not just directions, but [Color:5]altitudes[Color:0].

Original: I expected nothing less from my most
reliable explorers. Now, tell me where
you heard this demonic voice.
Translation: I expected nothing less from my most
reliable explorers. Now, tell me where
you heard this demonic voice.

Original: Hmm... I see... And from where did it
seem to originate?
Translation: Hmm... I see... And from where did it
seem to originate?

Original: Understood. I shall send my finest
scouts at once.
Translation: Understood. I shall send my finest
scouts at once.

Original: My friends... do you know the meaning
of regret? That is how I am feeling
right now.
[Page]
There was no demonic voice at the
location you pointed out, let alone
a bear's!
[Page]
It is important for the information
you give us to be accurate. Try again,
and pay closer attention this time.
Translation: My friends... do you know the meaning
of regret? That is how I am feeling
right now.
[Page]
There was no demonic voice at the
location you pointed out, let alone
a bear's!
[Page]
It is important for the information
you give us to be accurate. Try again,
and pay closer attention this time.

Original: I am sorry to say, but though your
report was accurate, it was not quite
enough.
[Page]
To be sure, my scouts heard the
allegedly demonic voice at the site
you specified.
[Page]
But as for its origin, they could not
find a single trace.
[Page]
You were half correct... but halfway
between success and failure is still
failure. I expect better next time.
Translation: I am sorry to say, but though your
report was accurate, it was not quite
enough.
[Page]
To be sure, my scouts heard the
allegedly demonic voice at the site
you specified.
[Page]
But as for its origin, they could not
find a single trace.
[Page]
You were half correct... but halfway
between success and failure is still
failure. I expect better next time.

Original: Splendid! That is the only word for
what you have accomplished! You've
done a fine job, my friends!
[Page]
My scouts have confirmed the locations
you gave us for the demonic voice and
its origin.
[Page]
It seems the "voice" was merely wind
blowing through the chasm... A gentle
prank from Mother Nature.
[Page]
But now that we know, the explorers
can proceed with untroubled minds.
Very fine work.
[Page]
I've already notified the bar that
my request has been fulfilled. Go and
claim your reward!
Translation: Splendid! That is the only word for
what you have accomplished! You've
done a fine job, my friends!
[Page]
My scouts have confirmed the locations
you gave us for the demonic voice and
its origin.
[Page]
It seems the "voice" was merely wind
blowing through the chasm... A gentle
prank from Mother Nature.
[Page]
But now that we know, the explorers
can proceed with untroubled minds.
Very fine work.
[Page]
I've already notified the bar that
my request has been fulfilled. Go and
claim your reward!

Original: Man is very fearful of the unknown...
They'd risk their lives for answers,
purely to bring peace of mind.
[Page]
That may seem like a contradiction,
but it is at the heart of the spirit
of exploration.
Translation: Man is very fearful of the unknown...
They'd risk their lives for answers,
purely to bring peace of mind.
[Page]
That may seem like a contradiction,
but it is at the heart of the spirit
of exploration.

Original: After carefully piloting your skyship
through the mountains, you cover your
ears as a frightening moan echoes!
[Page]
The roar shakes your very skyship!
You begin to fear that a large beast
is closing in on you...
[Page]
If so, you will not be able to avoid
a battle should you stay here. It may
be prudent to run away...!
Translation: After carefully piloting your skyship
through the mountains, you cover your
ears as a frightening moan echoes!
[Page]
The roar shakes your very skyship!
You begin to fear that a large beast
is closing in on you...
[Page]
If so, you will not be able to avoid
a battle should you stay here. It may
be prudent to run away...!

Original: [Color:5]Will you run away?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Will you run away?[Color:0]

Original: The scale of that voice makes whatever
it belongs to sound enormous... You
are by no means sure you can win!
[Page]
You quickly flee from this spot!
Translation: The scale of that voice makes whatever
it belongs to sound enormous... You
are by no means sure you can win!
[Page]
You quickly flee from this spot!

Original: You find the courage to discover the
owner of that moan and decide to hold
your position!
[Page]
As the moan grows louder, you begin
to fear this terrifying beast may be
fully larger than your skyship...!
[Page]
There is still time to flee, but if
you do not do so now, you must be
prepared to face whatever comes!
Translation: You find the courage to discover the
owner of that moan and decide to hold
your position!
[Page]
As the moan grows louder, you begin
to fear this terrifying beast may be
fully larger than your skyship...!
[Page]
There is still time to flee, but if
you do not do so now, you must be
prepared to face whatever comes!

Original: [Color:5]Will you run away?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Will you run away?[Color:0]

Original: [Color:5]Are you certain?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Are you certain?[Color:0]

Original: You draw your weapons and prepare
yourselves for a fight to the death!
Translation: You draw your weapons and prepare
yourselves for a fight to the death!

Original: The party waits anxiously...
[Page]
But no matter how long you wait,
nothing appears to face you...
[Page]
Yet the overwhelming moan does not
die down...
Translation: The party waits anxiously...
[Page]
But no matter how long you wait,
nothing appears to face you...
[Page]
Yet the overwhelming moan does not
die down...

Original: There can be no doubt this is the
voice the explorers feared so and
the Count would like investigated!
[Page]
The other explorers were too afraid
of the moans heard here and fled.
[Page]
The voice's origin is most likely
somewhere else. You continue the
search without lowering your guard...
Translation: There can be no doubt this is the
voice the explorers feared so and
the Count would like investigated!
[Page]
The other explorers were too afraid
of the moans heard here and fled.
[Page]
The voice's origin is most likely
somewhere else. You continue the
search without lowering your guard...

Original: Just as before, the moan continues to
echo from below...
Translation: Just as before, the moan continues to
echo from below...

Original: As you search for the origin of the
demonic voice, you suddenly hear a
high-pitched whistling sound.
[Page]
It is the sound one would expect from
a current of wind being forced between
the cliff face and a pillar below.
[Page]
You recall the terrifying, demonic
voice you heard earlier...
[Page]
That moaning must have originated
here before blending with other
sounds and echoing far and wide!
[Page]
You have at last discovered the origin
of the demonic voice! You note it down
in order to report it to the Count...
Translation: As you search for the origin of the
demonic voice, you suddenly hear a
high-pitched whistling sound.
[Page]
It is the sound one would expect from
a current of wind being forced between
the cliff face and a pillar below.
[Page]
You recall the terrifying, demonic
voice you heard earlier...
[Page]
That moaning must have originated
here before blending with other
sounds and echoing far and wide!
[Page]
You have at last discovered the origin
of the demonic voice! You note it down
in order to report it to the Count...

Original: As the wind passes through, a high-
pitched whistling sound echoes...
Translation: As the wind passes through, a high-
pitched whistling sound echoes...
